ygData.subject: RE: RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded look at t he good old da ys)
ygData.msgSnippet: Nothing was more depressing than last night with my cleric twink in SK Penthouse...  We had a bard with us that ended up getting aggroed on from birds below.
ygData.messageBody:
Nothing was more depressing than last night with my cleric twink in SK
Penthouse... We had a bard with us that ended up getting aggroed on from
birds below. Of course you can't attack them but they can certainly attack
you. So he decides to run to the zone.

He didn't make it. His drum was useless.

<sigh>

I don't even know HOW to travel with my bard without trusting in our
blinding speed. "OK, we're going to just run through this zone, do not stop
if attacked, just keep going. We can outrun anything."


>
>There is nothing more ponderous than a High Elf cleric in full
>bronze...except maybe a bard with broken drums...
>
>Ponderous...ponderous...
>
>
